location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Copy of letter No 1644/452 of 1872 from Colonel Lewis Pelly, HBM's Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, on board British India Steam Navigation Company's Steam Ship India, to The Secretary to Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter reporting on the efforts of Captain Gavin Commanding the Mail Steamer Cashmerein saving the lives of some 'Arab fishermen' and suggesting that a letter of acknowledgement from Government to the agents of the British India Steam Navigation Company, Messrs Nicol and Company of Bombay, might be appropriate.
